properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 08.
1. TUG NAS PATHFINDER, WHITE AND BLACK HULL,
   SEVEN PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT
   IN 45-45.2N 007-48.4W AT 091330Z FEB.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A
   SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO MRCC ETEL, TELEX: 42950519,
   PHONE: 332 9755 3535, FAX: 332 9755 4934,
   E-MAIL: ETEL@MRCCFR.EU.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 453/18.
